titles: Taxes no charge in a letter from a gentleman, to a person of quality, shewing the nature, use, and benefit of taxes in this kingdom, and compared with the impositions of foreign states : together with their improvement of trade in time of war.
author: Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.
notes: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
